entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this morning then changing to flurries and ice pellets this morning and ending this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
